products.longDescription: The Control 65P/T is a compact full-range, two-way pendant-type loudspeaker that provides superb sound reproduction and very consistent, wide coverage for rooms with open architecture ceilings and other locations where a pendant form factor is desired. JBL’s patent-pending Radiation Boundary Integrator®(RBI) technology, adapted from the groundbreaking VERTEC™ Series of line array loudspeakers, delivers consistent coverage of the listening area. Combining a large 200 mm (8 in) diameter waveguide with low-frequency projection apertures, the two coaxially-mounted drivers provide a seamless integration of coverage, resulting in extremely even pattern control and coverage where all listeners hear a consistent, high-fidelity sound quality. The wide 120°coverage pattern allows for the use of fewer speakers, reducing the cost of the installed system without sacrificing performance. The Control 65P/T contains a high-quality 60 Watt multi-tap transformer for use on 70V/100V distributed loudspeaker lines, and is switchable for 8-ohm voice-coil direct operation.
products.name: JBL - Control C65P/T 5.25" 150W 8 Ohm and 70V/100V Pendant Speaker-Pair - Black

For example, the 4-1/2" driver-based model has the bass and dynamics of a 5-1/4" traditional speaker, while the 5-1/4" performs like a traditional 6-1/2". Pure Aluminum dome tweeter featuring a specially shaped housing that avoids the diffraction distortions of traditional post mounted tweeters, and a sophisticated adjustable crossover network, the DI Series delivers the kind of lifelike sonic performance and broad even dispersion that you've come to expect from Definitive Technology.

Cold-welded, gold-plated connectors ensure a secure, reliable connection, providing durability and long-lasting performance. Whether you're connecting a portable device, computer, or other equipment with a 3.5mm output to your audio system, the AudioQuest Golden Gate 3.5mm Mini to RCA cable is built to elevate your listening experience. Every detail in Golden Gate’s design enhances audio quality, delivering rich, nuanced sound for all your music, movies, and more.

products.longDescription: True wireless noise cancelling Beats Studio Bud are made for music. Designed with a custom acoustic platform, Beats Studio Bud are engineered to deliver powerful, balanced sound in a compact, in-ear form factor. The result — immersive sound that pulls the emotion of music from the studio to your ears to keep you inspired. These earbuds feature two listening modes, Active Noise Cancelling (ANC) and Transparency mode, to give you total control of your sound. Each earbud has up to 8 hours of listening time⁴ with two additional charges provided by its pocket-sized charging case to give you up to 24 hours of combined playback.⁵ Beats Studio Bud also offer simple one-touch pairing for Apple¹ and Android² devices.
products.name: Beats - Studio Buds Totally Wireless Noise Cancelling Earbuds - Black

products.longDescription: Create your own whole-house music system with this Denon Heos home sound system at the center. products.longDescription: Experience impressive power and exceptional value with the XGA-2000 Professional Amplifier. Ideal for PA systems and DJ rigs, it delivers pure, consistent wattage night after night. The amplifier brings 2000W of instant peak power, ensuring plenty of drive without clipping for your PA or DJ setup. Patented front-to-rear airflow technology powered by a variable speed thermal stabilizer guarantees seamless performance. The unit's front panel features easy-to-use dial controls for channels 1 and 2 and LED protect, signal, clip and bridge indicators that let you know the amp's status at a glance. Incredibly reliable, the XGA-2000 is designed with a durable yet lightweight enclosure and comes with safety features that include thermal overload and short circuit protection. The power amplifier includes balanced XLR and 1/4" (6.5 mm jack) inputs and unbalanced RCA inputs. For outputs, it has three Speakon connectors for channel A, channel B and bridge as well as 5-point binding banana posts. Performance features include a frequency response of 10 Hz to 50 kHz at 1.5 dB with a signal-to-noise ratio of 20 Hz to 20 kHz at 90 dB. The amp has a total harmonic distortion of less than 0.1% and an input sensitivity of 0.77 volts. If you�re serious about sound, the XGA-2000 Professional Amplifier offers dependability and performance you can count on.
products.name: Gemini - XGA-2000 Professional Power Amplifier - Black

products.longDescription: Experience high-quality sound with these Sennheiser high resolution headphones, featuring handmade fiber earpads for comfortable listening. Two connection leads offer balanced sound, letting you connect to dual outputs for true stereo sound. These Sennheiser high resolution headphones feature absorber technology that filters sound and eliminates unwanted peaks which may inhibit pure sound enjoyment.
products.name: Sennheiser - HD 800 S Over-the-Ear Audiophile Reference Headphones - Ring Radiator Drivers, Open-Back Earcups, with Balanced Cable - Black

The grill and speaker can be painted to match the surrounding surface and a paint guard is included. Bowers & Wilkins CI300 Series of in-ceiling and in-wall speakers offer high quality sound at cost effective prices while having the option to be used in more humid areas of your home such as a bathroom or indoor pool. The suitcase record player features a 3-speed, belt-driven turntable to reduce vibration, as well as wireless Bluetooth connectivity, so you can listen from up to 33 feet away. In your home or on the go, your music will never be far!
